name: ganymede
description: Ganymede is an open-source tool for archiving Twitch VODs and clips with metadata and transcoding. It works with Cloudflare R2 or local storage and provides a web UI for browsing archived content.
features: VOD Archiving: Automatically download and archive Twitch VODs and clips before they expire or are deleted.
Chat Preservation: Capture and store chat logs alongside video content for complete stream archives.
Metadata Storage: Save stream metadata including titles, descriptions, timestamps, and viewer counts.
Video Transcoding: Transcode archived content to optimize storage space and playback compatibility.
Cloud Storage Support: Integrate with Cloudflare R2 or local storage for flexible archive management.
Web Interface: Browse and search archived streams through a dedicated web UI with filtering options.
Automated Downloads: Schedule automatic archiving of favorite channels and streamers.
Self-Hosted Archive: Maintain your own Twitch content archive independent of platform retention policies.
